pages.text: End spells can be found in End Cities or Stronghold Libraries

pages.title: Darkball
pages.text: Shoots a void beam that creates a Dragon's Breath zone on impact with a mob. $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Swap
pages.text: Allows the user to swap places with the target $(li)Mana Cost: 40 $(li)Range: 20

pages.title: Ender
pages.text: Instantly opens the user's ender chest inventory $(li)Mana Cost: 20

pages.title: Shadow
pages.text: Turns the user into a shadow that can fly and phase through walls for 10s + 2 per spell power $(li)Mana Cost: 50

pages.title: Warp
pages.text: Teleports you in the direction you're looking for 8 blocks + 1 per spell power $(li)Mana Cost: 10
